name: Dominik Beƒçaj
description: A resume site for Dominik Beƒçaj, containing contact information and all professional experiences which may be of interest to a future employer

tasks: Developing enterprise microservice application for transportation company, requiring geolocation services with live updates to active drivers
Using CI/CD workflow with automatic integration and unit testing for improved reliability and faster development
Responsible for maintaining and debugging microservice application containers on AWS ECS with multiple environments
Implementing Apache Kafka for event driven architecture
Created a scalable subscription service with hunderds monthly customers
Worked on a large supply chain planning software for major retail stores in Europe
Writing analytic queries and scripts for data warehouse containing terabytes of data
Managing a enterprise production linux server with shell scripts
Creating database script with CPro, capable of processing huge amount of data
Created REST API for a startup application, using modern NestJS framework
Setup and use of AWS for hosting and storing compressed files
Used MongoDB and PostgreSQL for fast data storage
Setting up computers for industrial automation

items.name: JavaScript
items.text: I am familiar with the JavaScript language and its superset [TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/), as I have used them frequently in projects. I like using [ExpressJS](https://expressjs.com/) and [NestJS](https://nestjs.com/) for backend and [React](https://reactjs.org/) for frontend.

items.name: Database
items.text: I have theoretical knowledge and experience with creating and using relational SQL databases and non-relational NoSQL databases. So far, I've used [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org/), [MongoDB](https://www.mongodb.com/) and [Firebase](https://firebase.google.com/).

items.name: Java
items.text: I know how to use modern Java 17 language and its JAX-RS frameworks, such as [Quarkus](https://quarkus.io/) for backend development, and [Kotlin](https://kotlinlang.org/) for testing and developing Android applications.

items.name: C
items.text: I have used C throughout my years in school on various projects. I have a good understanding of various algorithms and data structures as well as C related concepts, such as memory managment, pointers and the preprocessor.

items.name: Linux
items.text: I use Linux in my spare time because I like to adapt the system to my requirements and because vim themes are very aesthetic üòÑ. I can write shell scripts, and I can use tools like regexp, sed and vim.

items.name: Python
items.text: I like to use Python to write short scripts and for data mining. I am familiar with [NumPy](https://numpy.org/) and [matplotlib](https://matplotlib.org/).

competencies: Programming in C, Assembly, Python, Java, JavaScript
items.project: Thesis: [Analysis of RSocket protocol and its use in microservices](https://repozitorij.uni-lj.si/IzpisGradiva.php?id=125536&lang=eng)

items.programName: Undergraduate Computer Science Degree, second year

items.institutionName: Secondary School of Electrical and Computer Engineering Ljubljana
competencies: Basics in microcontroller design and programming
items.project: Graduation project: 2D Multiplayer game made in C++ with QT framework
